channel.title: Good start source?
channel.description: Does anyone have a link or suggestion for a source/client i can use to start coding? I'm newer to coding and i figure instead of asking a ton of questions on the forums i want to try and self-inform myself and try to learn to code myself. I have tried a couple sources but I would think that something less complicated, maybe a blanker source, would help nudge me into coding. So if anyone have a source/client that you think would decent for me to start on please leave a link or name. If anyone here has any tips to learning how to start coding don't be scared to leave them here :)

item.title: Good start source?
item.dc:creator: @italia_kid italia kid
item.description:
@italia_kid wrote:

d man103456:

Does anyone have a link or suggestion for a source/client i can use to start coding? I’m newer to coding and i figure instead of asking a ton of questions on the forums i want to try and self-inform myself and try to learn to code myself. I have tried a couple sources but I would think that something less complicated, maybe a blanker source, would help nudge me into coding. So if anyone have a source/client that you think would decent for me to start on please leave a link or name. If anyone here has any tips to learning how to start coding don’t be scared to leave them here

Okay, I Would Say Allstar Source Is Good To Learn How To Code, Its How I Learnt, But Now Im Coding A Delta Source, You Will Get The Hang Of It

Read full topic

@d_man103456 wrote:

Yeah I’ve been reading the java for dummies book and it is very very helpful I got it for free =\ off of a download from another website. Since I don’t think I can’t say other RSPS names =) I will just leave it at that =)

item.title: Good start source?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you honestly want to learn, then actually learn the Java programming language. Private servers teach you a very limited area of the language, but will teach you the basics over time.

http://java.sun.com/
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,436613.0.html

Read full topic
